string-array.name: event_descriptions
string-array.item:
As one of the most entertaining events of ISHAANYA2k14, participants are invited to contest for the title of Gaming Champion in any of the following LAN multiplayer games :
 
- Counter Strike 1.6 
- NFS Most Wanted 
- Pro Evolution Soccer (PES) 

facebook.com/BattleGround06

One of the most important event of ISHAANYA2k14, exclusively designed to evaluate the knowledge of the participants in the field of Civil Engineering comes in a new face and with lots of excitement. Details coming soon.. \n\nfacebook.com/brainforce.14
Grand online and offline photography contest.
Competition based on PCB designing and simulation.
Slide presentation of any research oriented synopsis of technical thesis, industrial beneficiary ideas or scientific analysis,etc.
Competition based on general understanding of computer and hardware assembling.
Innovative technical and scientific model presentation.
Event based on general perception of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering to test ingenuity and knowledge on puzzles. \n\nfacebook.com/KryptosOfficial
A dancing competition where participants are to perform and show their talent in dancing by group or solo performance. \n\nfacebook.com/profile.php?id=761969037165137
Drawing and designing competition with AutoCAD.
Event based on general perception of Computer Programming.
Event to test the Bikers\' skills.
Event based on drawing and designing skill on STADPRO. \n\nfacebook.com/pages/PRO-STAAD/249948368507983
A script writing skill test based on particular theme.

Your chance to showcase your dressing sense and compete for the title of Mr. and Miss Ishaanya, individually or with your partner. Traditional Indian dresses like shirts, suits, salwars, sarees are mainly included. \n\nfacebook.com/mr.missishaanya

string-array.name: workshop_details
string-array.item: Assistant Manager at Samsung Research Institute, Noida.
Conducted by TechNick, Robotics club of TIT.

resources.string:
Welcome to the official Android app of Ishaanya 2K14, the annual Techno-Cultural Fest of Tripura Institute of Technology. 

You can swipe from left or click on top left icon to access the navigation menu. 

The event details provided here are incomplete in some places and will be updated accordingly as preparations progress and details are finalized.

To participate in any of the events, you are requested to fill the online form by clicking on the link given below. \n\nYou will be provided with options to choose event and provide individual or group details.
